description: This week's Battletech Mech Overview looks at the Penetrator, a Clan-Invasion era heavy mech from the Hansen's Roughriders box.
title: Battletech Mech Overview: Penetrator

description: Magic’s newest expansion takes us to the newly introduced plane of Thunder Junction for a rootin’ tootin’ treasure huntin’ time. A new set means new cards, and we’re wrapping up our review with the Big Score cards from the set.  Last time we covered the monocolor cards, and this time as usual we won’t be […]
title: Outlaws of Thunder Junction Review, Part 4 of 4: The Big Score Cards

description: As part of the Kill Team: Nightmare set, the 41st millennium’s most over-the-top spooky guys are brought bang up to date; no longer are they reliant on a frankly hideous resin upgrade sprue to get their batwings and scary skulls on. Kill Team: Nemesis Claw represents the continuation of a growing trend within Kill Team […]
title: Kill Team: Night Lords Model Review

description: Intro Marvel Crisis Protocol (MCP to most people) has been out for over 4 years and there has never been a better time to get into the game. If you love the Marvel universe, have been curious about the game, or are looking for a secondary game to supplement your hobby read on! The setting […]
title: Why You Should Be Playing Marvel Crisis Protocol

description: Games Workshop provided us an early look at Battlescroll: Impending Vermindoom. We did not get a chance to review any FAQs or rules clarifications that have typically accompanied the release of a Battlescroll. It’s been a little over two months since Battlescroll: Nullstone Cache dropped with some major changes to several factions, core rules, and […]
title: Age of Sigmar Battlescroll: Impending Vermindoom

description: Welcome to the Terrain Showcase, where we share table setups for Star Wars Shatterpoint. Our aim is to help fuel your creativity, find ideas, and get useful tips for creating your next battlefield adventure. Introducing Enth Terrain Used: Core Set, High Ground Expansion, Ground Cover Expansion Playmat Used: Unknown Desert Mission Pack: Sabotage Showdown Color […]
title: Shatterpoint Terrain Talk Showcase: Enth

description: Rob's road through 2024 continues as he plays some final practice games doing prep for the Oxford GT and gets in some last-minute painting.
title: TheChirurgeon’s Road Through 2024, Part 6: Final Prep for the Oxford GT

description: Welcome back to our Best Year in Gaming March Madness bracket competition! We’ve completed round 2 and are now in the middle of the Sweet Sixteen of our competition, narrowing things down to a final four years for the competition. Yesterday we looked at some tough matchups in the Northeast conference. 2004 was a year […]
title: The Best Year in Gaming: The Sweet Sixteen, Southeast Conference

description: John from Can You Roll a Crit? is joined by Scrivo as they do another Crit ! Cast podcast episode to cover all the tactics for the Corsair Voidscarred kill team! They go through the team in-depth, going over all the tips and tactics needed to win with these Aeldari space pirates! https://www.podbean.com/ew/pb-rw65n-15ea238
title: CYRAC: Corsair Voidscarred Kill Team Guide
